mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NUM, MEMBER_NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into INQUIRE ( INQUIRE_NUM, MEMBER_NUM, INQUIRE_SUBJECT, INQUIRE_CONTENTS, INQUIRE_TIME ) values ( #{inquireNum}, #{memberNum}, #{inquireSubject}, #{inquireContents}, sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT m.MEMBER_ID AS inquireAuthor FROM INQUIRE i JOIN MEMBER m ON i.MEMBER_NUM = m.MEMBER_NUM WHERE i.INQUIRE_NUM = #{inquireNum}

SELECT i.INQUIRE_NUM, i.INQUIRE_SUBJECT, i.INQUIRE_CONTENTS, i.INQUIRE_TIME, m.MEMBER_NAME AS memberName FROM INQUIRE i JOIN MEMBER m ON i.MEMBER_NUM = m.MEMBER_NUM WHERE i.INQUIRE_NUM = #{inquireNum}
